verses.verse: Ho, <WH1945> every one <WH3605> that thirsteth, <WH6771> come <WH1980> ye to the waters, <WH4325> and he that <WH834> hath no <WH369> money; <WH3701> come <WH1980> ye, buy, <WH7666> and eat; <WH398> yea, come, <WH1980> buy <WH7666> wine <WH3196> and milk <WH2461> without <WH3808> money <WH3701> and without <WH3808> price. <WH4242>

Wherefore <WH4100> do ye spend <WH8254> money <WH3701> for that which is not <WH3808> bread? <WH3899> and your labor <WH3018> for that which satisfieth <WH7654> not? <WH3808> hearken diligently <WH8085> <WH8085> unto <WH413> me, and eat <WH398> ye that which is good, <WH2896> and let your soul <WH5315> delight itself <WH6026> in fatness. <WH1880>

Incline <WH5186> your ear, <WH241> and come <WH1980> unto <WH413> me: hear, <WH8085> and your soul <WH5315> shall live; <WH2421> and I will make <WH3772> an everlasting <WH5769> covenant <WH1285> with you, even the sure <WH539> mercies <WH2617> of David. <WH1732>
Behold, <WH2005> I have given <WH5414> him for a witness <WH5707> to the people, <WH3816> a leader <WH5057> and commander <WH6680> to the people. <WH3816>

Behold, <WH2005> thou shalt call <WH7121> a nation <WH1471> that thou knowest <WH3045> not, <WH3808> and nations <WH1471> that knew <WH3045> not <WH3808> thee shall run <WH7323> unto <WH413> thee because <WH4616> of the LORD <WH3068> thy God, <WH430> and for the Holy One <WH6918> of Israel; <WH3478> for <WH3588> he hath glorified <WH6286> thee.
Seek <WH1875> ye the LORD <WH3068> while he may be found, <WH4672> call <WH7121> ye upon him while he is <WH1961> near: <WH7138>

Let the wicked <WH7563> forsake <WH5800> his way, <WH1870> and the unrighteous <WH205> man <WH376> his thoughts: <WH4284> and let him return <WH7725> unto <WH413> the LORD, <WH3068> and he will have mercy <WH7355> upon him; and to <WH413> our God, <WH430> for <WH3588> he will abundantly <WH7235> pardon. <WH5545>
For <WH3588> my thoughts <WH4284> are not <WH3808> your thoughts, <WH4284> neither <WH3808> are your ways <WH1870> my ways, <WH1870> saith <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068>

For <WH3588> as the heavens <WH8064> are higher <WH1361> than the earth, <WH4480> <WH776> so <WH3651> are my ways higher <WH1361> <WH1870> than your ways, <WH4480> <WH1870> and my thoughts <WH4284> than your thoughts. <WH4480> <WH4284>

For <WH3588> as <WH834> the rain <WH1653> cometh down, <WH3381> and the snow <WH7950> from <WH4480> heaven, <WH8064> and returneth <WH7725> not <WH3808> thither, <WH8033> but <WH3588> <WH518> watereth <WH7301> <WH853> the earth, <WH776> and maketh it bring forth <WH3205> and bud, <WH6779> that it may give <WH5414> seed <WH2233> to the sower, <WH2232> and bread <WH3899> to the eater: <WH398>

So <WH3651> shall my word <WH1697> be <WH1961> that <WH834> goeth forth <WH3318> out of my mouth: <WH4480> <WH6310> it shall not <WH3808> return <WH7725> unto <WH413> me void, <WH7387> but <WH3588> <WH518> it shall accomplish <WH6213> <WH853> that which <WH834> I please, <WH2654> and it shall prosper <WH6743> in the thing whereto <WH834> I sent <WH7971> it.

For <WH3588> ye shall go out <WH3318> with joy, <WH8057> and be led forth <WH2986> with peace: <WH7965> the mountains <WH2022> and the hills <WH1389> shall break forth <WH6476> before <WH6440> you into singing, <WH7440> and all <WH3605> the trees <WH6086> of the field <WH7704> shall clap <WH4222> their hands. <WH3709>

Instead <WH8478> of the thorn <WH5285> shall come up <WH5927> the fir tree, <WH1265> and instead <WH8478> of the brier <WH5636> shall come up <WH5927> the myrtle tree: <WH1918> and it shall be <WH1961> to the LORD <WH3068> for a name, <WH8034> for an everlasting <WH5769> sign <WH226> that shall not <WH3808> be cut off. <WH3772>
